original_text: And he answered them, “To you it has been given to know the secrets of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it has not been given.
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 천국의 비밀을 아는 것이 너희에게는 허락되었으나 그들에게는 아니되었나니

sentences.original_text: To you it has been given to know the secrets of the kingdom of heaven,
sentences.korean_translation: 천국의 비밀을 아는 것이 너희에게 주어졌으나,

sentences.original_text: but to them it has not been given.
